# text/template builtin functions js, html, and urlquery should work.

check-templates

-- go.mod --
module example.com/app

go 1.25.0
-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"text/template"
)

var templates = template.Must(template.New("page").Parse(`<p>{{.Title | html}}</p><script>var t = {{.Title | js}};</script><a href="?q={{.Title | urlquery}}">link</a>`))

type Page struct {
	Title string
}

func render() {
	_ = templates.ExecuteTemplate(io.Discard, "page", Page{Title: "Hello"})
}

var _ = fmt.Sprint
